column4: Alright, another question, I'm trying to run a file in the terminal, the terminal opens but then quickly closes out. Any suggestions on fixing this?
No answers? :(
Can someone help me please?
i missed your question
are you writing IN the terminal or in the 'run appliation' box?
im using the 'run application' box
shell scripts should be run in a terminal window
okay, just to make sure, the command to run a python script is py scriptname.py correct?
blahblah.py yes
because that has not been working for me :(
do you have the correct python interpreter installed?
thats what it says when i start the interpreter
there are several versions of python
read my copy/paste its 2.4.1, the one that came with ubuntu already installed
but perhaps your .py depends on a nother version
i created this file myself today
i know next to nothing about python, other than i have several versions installed right now
sigh...alright can you point me in a direction i should go for help?
ask uncle google, cuz i'm not a python man
uncle google has already been asked, but thanks for the trying anyway..
